name: The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim - The Skyrim Library, Vol. II Man, Mer, and Beast
summary: For the first time, the collected texts from the critically and commercially acclaimed fantasy video game The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim are bound together in three exciting volumes. Lavishly illustrated and produced, these titles are straight out of the world of Skyrim - and a must for any wandering adventurer.
info:
• 中文名: 上古卷轴5: 天际 - 天际图书馆 卷Ⅱ: 人类·精灵·兽族
  • 作者: Bethesda Softworks
  • 出版社: Titan Books Ltd
  • 其他出版社: 新星出版社
  • 发售日: 2016-03-01
  • 页数: 232
  • ISBN: 9781783293209
